alert.note: Alert for Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 06 at 4:04PM MDT until June 06 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHEASTERN SWEET GRASS COUNTY... At 404 PM MDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in and around Sweetgrass Creek. Radar estimates between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, highways, and other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Rural roads may become impassable. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Sweet Grass County Public has reported water over the road near Howie Road and Lower Sweet Grass Road. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency officials and request they pass the information to the National Weather Service in Billings.
